page.title: 08 Children's Life
page.content: After school most children play on their bicycles and play with other children. Indoors 20% of children have computers to play{games}on. Some like soft toys and board games such as Game of Life or Monopoly whilst others play with farm sets or dominoes. Most of the girls and a few of the boys enjoy reading at home. In pop music most children like Duran Duran best, but Wham is a close second. Most children get 50p{pocket money,}but up to Â£1:50. Most buy sweets with their money. A few people don't go on holiday: 20% go abroad. Most of the children in our class have comics, Beano is the most popular. Most children have{pets,}dogs and cats are most popular.Other animals kept are hamsters, rabbits, tortoises, fish, ponies, chickens and ducks. Art followed by sports and maths are liked best in school.
